trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> creato per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> rimane in memoria fino a quando l'oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> viene eliminato definitivamente.

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La stessa istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> viene restituito dalle chiamate successive a questo metodo e le chiamate a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo del peer è determinato dal <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> callback virtuale.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is created, and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> non implementa il callback, non <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> viene creato, e questo metodo restituisce `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> per l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />; or <see langword="null" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> was not created by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.UIElement)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> oppure <see langword="null" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> non è stato creato dal metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement(System.Windows.UIElement)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tasto di scelta rapida per <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAcceleratorKey(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" /> restituito da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAcceleratorKey(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tasto di scelta per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />. Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Tasto di scelta per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che identifica in modo univoco l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAutomationId(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> restituito da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAutomationId(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che rappresenta il rettangolo di delimitazione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that contains the coordinates of the element.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che contiene le coordinate dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, if the element is not both a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />, this method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: Facoltativamente, se l'elemento non è né un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> né un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />, il metodo restituisce <see cref="P:System.Windows.Rect.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: A list of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco di elementi figlio <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> string.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile in <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> on the element that allows a click.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> nell'elemento che consente la selezione.

trans-unit.source: The point values are (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />) if the element is not both a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: I valori dei punti sono (<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />) se l'elemento non è né un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> né un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che descrive la funzionalità dell’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetHelpText(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText" /> restituito da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetHelpText(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the string that returns is the same text that the control provides in the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: In genere, la stringa restituita è lo stesso testo che fornisce il controllo nella descrizione comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that communicates the visual status of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che comunica lo stato visivo dell’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus" /> restituito da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact can be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, lo stato di un contatto di messenger può essere "Occupato" o "Online".

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the item type that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa leggibile che contiene il tipo di elemento che l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> rappresenta per questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType" /> restituito da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: String examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Esempi di stringhe sono "Documento", "Email" e "Contact".

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> per l'elemento indirizzato all'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> per questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> per l'elemento indirizzato all'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> per questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The element targeting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, but it does not have to be.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento come destinazione il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> può essere un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, ma non deve essere.

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> property will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> property as well.
trans-unit.target: Se si tratta di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> verrà automaticamente impostata il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> anche la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets the notification characteristics of the live region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le caratteristiche di notifica dell'area dinamica dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" />.

trans-unit.source: The notification characteristics of the live region.
trans-unit.target: Le caratteristiche di notifica dell'area dinamica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'etichetta di testo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> restituito da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> funzioni di proprietà simile a una stringa di testo utilizzato dagli utenti per spiegare il controllo al quale fanno riferimento.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Assicurarsi che sia disponibile una rappresentazione testuale per tutti i controlli di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] in modo che è possibile fare riferimento al controllo è a livello di codice in modo localizzato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> è disposto in una direzione specifica.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" />.

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Valore ricavato dall'enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" /> interface if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider" /> se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> ha correntemente uno stato attivo di input dalla tastiera.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'elemento ha lo stato attivo di input dalla tastiera; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> è un elemento che contiene dati presentati all'utente.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato al <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> viene considerato dall'utente finale come interattivo.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the user might understand the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Facoltativamente, l'utente potrebbe considerare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> come parte della struttura logica del controllo nell'[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> può accettare lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="boolean" /> that contains the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see langword="boolean" /> contenente il valore di <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> può accettare lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is focusable by the keyboard; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'elemento è attivabile da tastiera; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l’elemento non è sullo schermo; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se l'elemento è visibile.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, un elemento è visualizzato sullo schermo, ma non è ancora visibile.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è visualizzato sullo schermo ma è nascosto da altri elementi, potrebbe non essere visibile.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso il metodo restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> contiene contenuto protetto.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> is required to be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> è obbligatorio per il completamento di un modulo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="boolean" /> that contains the value that is returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />, if it's set; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see langword="boolean" /> che contiene il valore restituito da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm(System.Windows.DependencyObject)" />, se è impostato; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Imposta lo stato attivo di input dalla tastiera sull'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
